title: Explaining Legal Concepts with Augmented Large Language Models (GPT-4). (arXiv:2306.09525v1 [cs.CL])
abstract: Interpreting the meaning of legal open-textured terms is a key task of legal professionals. An important source for this interpretation is how the term was applied in previous court cases. In this paper, we evaluate the performance of GPT-4 in generating factually accurate, clear and relevant explanations of terms in legislation. We compare the performance of a baseline setup, where GPT-4 is directly asked to explain a legal term, to an augmented approach, where a legal information retrieval module is used to provide relevant context to the model, in the form of sentences from case law. We found that the direct application of GPT-4 yields explanations that appear to be of very high quality on their surface. However, detailed analysis uncovered limitations in terms of the factual accuracy of the explanations. translated_title: 利用增强型大型语言模型（GPT-4）解释法律概念
translated_abstract: 解释法律开放性术语的含义是法律专业人员的重要任务。先前法院案例中该术语的应用是解释其含义的重要来源。本文评估了GPT-4生成法律术语解释的准确性、清晰性和相关性的性能。我们将GPT-4被直接要求解释法律术语的基准设置的性能与增强方法进行了比较，在增强方法中，一个法律信息检索模块被用来为模型提供相关背景，即来自案例法的句子。我们发现，直接应用GPT-4产生的解释在表面上似乎非常高质量。然而，详细分析揭示了解释的实际准确性方面存在的限制。此外，我们发现增强性能可以提高质量，并似乎消除了幻觉问题，即模型发明不正确的陈述。这些发现为在法律领域中使用大型语言模型开辟了新的途径。
tldr: 本文评估了利用GPT-4增强解释法律术语性能的方法。与基准设置相比，使用增强的法律信息检索模块可以提高法律术语解释的质量，并消除模型的幻觉问题，从而为在法律领域使用大型语言模型开辟了新的途径。
en_tdlr: This paper evaluates the performance of using GPT-4 to interpret legal terms, comparing a baseline setup to an augmented approach that utilizes a legal information retrieval module to provide relevant context. The augmentation improves the factual accuracy and eliminates hallucination issues, opening up new possibilities for using large language models in the legal domain.
